Text:
Not that I'm ungrateful here, but since this is Mondays episode which was the 12th. So, shouldn't the date on this be the 12th of September, not the 13th? Tuesday would be the 13th..

Yes, I'm very grateful like I said, but was just pointing out the error.
I was corrected on another site and the title does the correct date. My apologies to all. Keep up the great work :)
